Text:
Evol Gamer .. do you know how to burn movies from the iTunes Library into a DVD Movie?
Some help please .. Mahalo.
No Sorry But To My Understanding Thats Not Possible. But I Think You Can Do That With DVDRs And Just Burn It To A DVD. But Other Than That I Cant Help You.

Like Barack Obama says "Yes We Can"

If you have a Mac it's so easy and  FREE

Download and install a program called BURN 
that will convert it into DVD format and burn it to a DVD-R.

A PC is a little more complicated download a program called CONVERTXTODVD.

CONVERTXTODVD is Not FREE though.

I hope this helps you.

@whyler  "CONVERTXTODVD is Not FREE though."  Of course it's free.  There are many torrents on The Pirate Bay for convertXtodvd.  

This movie sounds interesting I'm gonna check it out. Thanks.
Excellent upload 10/10. This documentary is far more engrossing than anything I've ever seen.
